channel.title: Is it safe to activate USB?
channel.description:
I sometimes have to copy files onto the workstation. I did this by adding a shared folder. Copy via virtualbox tools does not work, I do not know why. (Is this deactivated?)
It would be easier if I could just plug a USB stick in and connect it to the workstation. USB is deactivated by whonix.
Is it safe to activate USB?

item.title: Is it safe to activate USB?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
USB: The short answer is, something to avoid, but not totally unsafe. See also:

Whonix

File Transfer

Copying files into and out of Whonix Virtual Machines.


For a longer answer about USB, see how and why Qubes handles the USB stack.

Copy via virtualbox tools does not work, I do not know why. (Is this deactivated?)
You mean clipboard sharing? If so, the answer is here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Guest_Additions#Clipboard_Sharing
